name: Fallen (itch) (Fer)
description:
Fallen is a fast paced top-down shooter. You play as the fallen one, a strange character who confront the hidden gods to try to break his eternal condemnation. In this journey you will be armed with the dark sword capable of firing and absorbing enemy attacks.

Controls:

  • Move:  WASD
  • Shoot: Right Mouse Button/SHIFT
  • Block: Left Mouse Button

I would love to keep updating the game and add more levels, enemy's, weapons and expand the lore.

The game is free, but if you wish, you can donate, even a single dollar helps me a lot.
